WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I used PHPExcel to generate a very complicated Excel, and worked good for Excel 2010 and Earlier. See Image named 2010-earlier. Howerver, I updated my Excel to 2013, and major cell formating deasepeared, see image 2013-later for the result. Any idea what is causing format problems in 2013 and later (365).

2013-later : https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B46plBneORCEVFdwbjdmNVl4VTQ/view?usp=sharing
2010-earlier : https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B46plBneORCEZkNxX093enVUY1U/view?usp=sharing

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Problem with cell formating with Excel 2013 and 365
